arabicText: وَجَعَلُوا۟ لِلَّهِ مِمَّا ذَرَأَ مِنَ ٱلْحَرْثِ وَٱلْأَنْعَـٰمِ نَصِيبًۭا فَقَالُوا۟ هَـٰذَا لِلَّهِ بِزَعْمِهِمْ وَهَـٰذَا لِشُرَكَآئِنَا ۖ فَمَا كَانَ لِشُرَكَآئِهِمْ فَلَا يَصِلُ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ ۖ وَمَا كَانَ لِلَّهِ فَهُوَ يَصِلُ إِلَىٰ شُرَكَآئِهِمْ ۗ سَآءَ مَا يَحْكُمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 among	 the	 crops	 and	 animals	 that	
Allah has	created,	they	assigned	(only)	a	portion	to	Him	and	therefore	said	“This	is	for	Allah”	- in	
their	opinion	- “and	this	is	for	our	partners	(false	deities)”;	so	the	portion	for	their	partners	does	
not	reach	Allah;	and	the	portion	for	Allah reaches	their	partners;	what	an	evil	judgement	they	
impose
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	Allah	ne	jo	kheti	aur	maweshi	paida	kiye	un	meiñ	usey	ek	hisse-dār	 thahrāya	 to	bole	yeh	
Allah	ka	hai	unke	khayāl	meiñ	aur	yeh	hamāre	shareekoñ	ka	to	woh	jo	unke	shareekoñ	ka	hai	
woh	to	khuda	ko	nahi	pahuñchta	aur	jo	khuda	ka	hai	woh	un	ke	shareekoñ	ko	pahuñchta	hai	kya	
hi	burā	ḥukm		lagāte	haiñ

arabicText: وَكَذَٰلِكَ زَيَّنَ لِكَثِيرٍۢ مِّنَ ٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ قَتْلَ أَوْلَـٰدِهِمْ شُرَكَآؤُهُمْ لِيُرْدُوهُمْ وَلِيَلْبِسُوا۟ عَلَيْهِمْ دِينَهُمْ ۖ وَلَوْ شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ مَا فَعَلُوهُ ۖ فَذَرْهُمْ وَمَا يَفْتَرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	similarly,	their	partners	(the	devils)	have	made	the	killing	of	their	children	seem	righteous	
in	the	sight of	many	of	the	polytheists,	in	order	to	ruin	them	and	make	their	religion	blurred	to	
them;	and	if	Allah willed	they	would	not	do	so,	therefore	leave	them	alone	with	their	fabrications.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	yuñ	hi	bahut	mushrikoñ	ki	nigāh	meiñ	unke	shareekoñ	ne	aulād	ka	qatl	bhalā	kar	dikhāya	
hai	ke	unheiñ		halāk	kareiñ	aur	unka	deen	un	par	mushtaba	kar	deiñ	aur	Allah	chāhta	to	aisa	na	
karte to	Tum	unheiñ		chhod	do	woh	haiñ	aur	unke	ifitira.

arabicText: وَقَالُوا۟ هَـٰذِهِۦٓ أَنْعَـٰمٌۭ وَحَرْثٌ حِجْرٌۭ لَّا يَطْعَمُهَآ إِلَّا مَن نَّشَآءُ بِزَعْمِهِمْ وَأَنْعَـٰمٌ حُرِّمَتْ ظُهُورُهَا وَأَنْعَـٰمٌۭ لَّا يَذْكُرُونَ ٱسْمَ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيْهَا ٱفْتِرَآءً عَلَيْهِ ۚ سَيَجْزِيهِم بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَفْتَرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	they	said,	“These	cattle	and	crops	are	
forbidden;	only	 those	whom	we	wish	can	
eat	 them”	 - in	 their	 opinion	 - and	 some	
cattle	are	those	which	they	have	forbidden	
riding	 upon,	 and	 some	 cattle	 over	 which	
they	 do	 not	 mention	 the	 name	 of	 Allah
while	 slaughtering	- all	 this	is	 fabricating	
lies	against	Allah;	He	will	soon	repay	them	
for	their	fabrications
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	bole	yeh	maweshi	aur	kheti	roki	huwi	
hai	 isey	 wo	 hi	 khāaye	 jise	 ham	 chhaheiñ	
apne	jhoote	khayāl	se	aur	kuchh	maweshi	
haiñ	 jin	 par	 chadna	 harām	 thehrāya	 aur	
kuchh	maweshi	ke	zibah	par	Allah	ka	nām	
nahi	lete	yeh	sab	Allah	par	jhoot	bāndhna	
hai	 ‘an-qareeb	 woh	 unheiñ	 badla	 dega	
unke	iftirāoñ	ka

arabicText: وَقَالُوا۟ مَا فِى بُطُونِ هَـٰذِهِ ٱلْأَنْعَـٰمِ خَالِصَةٌۭ لِّذُكُورِنَا وَمُحَرَّمٌ عَلَىٰٓ أَزْوَٰجِنَا ۖ وَإِن يَكُن مَّيْتَةًۭ فَهُمْ فِيهِ شُرَكَآءُ ۚ سَيَجْزِيهِمْ وَصْفَهُمْ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ حَكِيمٌ عَلِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
And	they	said,	“The	animals	in	the	bellies	
of	such	cattle	are	purely	for	our	males	and	
forbidden	to	our	women;	and	if	the	animal	
is	stillborn,	they	all	have	a	share	of	it”;	soon	
Allah will	repay	them	for	their	utterances;	
indeed	He	is	Wise,	All	Knowing.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 bole	 jo	 un	 maweshi	 ke	 pet	 meiñ	 hai	
woh	 nira	 (Khalis)	 hamāre	mardoñ	 ka	 hai	
aur	hamāri	aurtoñ	par	harām	hai	aur	mera	
huwa	 nikle	 to	 woh	 sab	 us	 meiñ	 shareek	
haiñ	 qareeb	hai	 ke	Allah	unheiñ	 	unki	un	
bātoñ	 ka	 Badla	 dega	 be-shak	 woh	 Ilm,
Hikmat	wāla	hai

arabicText: قَدْ خَسِرَ ٱلَّذِينَ قَتَلُوٓا۟ أَوْلَـٰدَهُمْ سَفَهًۢا بِغَيْرِ عِلْمٍۢ وَحَرَّمُوا۟ مَا رَزَقَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ ٱفْتِرَآءً عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ۚ قَدْ ضَلُّوا۟ وَمَا كَانُوا۟ مُهْتَدِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Indeed	 ruined	 are	 those	 who	 slay	 their	
children	 out	 of	 senseless	 ignorance	 and	
forbid	 the	 sustenance	 which	 Allah has	
bestowed	upon	them,	in	order	to	fabricate	
lies	against	Allah;	 they	 have	 undoubtedly	
gone	astray	and	not	attained	the	path
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 bole	 jo	 un	 maweshi	 ke	 pet	 meiñ	 hai	
woh	 nira	 (Khalis)	 hamāre	mardoñ	 ka	 hai	
aur	hamāri	aurtoñ	par	harām	hai	aur	mera	
huwa	 nikle	 to	 woh	 sab	 us	 meiñ	 shareek	
Beshak	 tabāh	huwe	woh	jo	apni	aulād	ko	
qatl	 karte	 haiñ	 ahmaqāna	 jihālat	 se	 aur	
harām	 thahrāte	 haiñ	 woh	 jo	 Allah	 ne	
unheiñ		rozi	di	Allah	par	jhoot	bāndh	ne	ko	
be-shak	woh	bahke	aur	rāh	na	pāyi

arabicText: ۞ وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنشَأَ جَنَّـٰتٍۢ مَّعْرُوشَـٰتٍۢ وَغَيْرَ مَعْرُوشَـٰتٍۢ وَٱلنَّخْلَ وَٱلزَّرْعَ مُخْتَلِفًا أُكُلُهُۥ وَٱلزَّيْتُونَ وَٱلرُّمَّانَ مُتَشَـٰبِهًۭا وَغَيْرَ مُتَشَـٰبِهٍۢ ۚ كُلُوا۟ مِن ثَمَرِهِۦٓ إِذَآ أَثْمَرَ وَءَاتُوا۟ حَقَّهُۥ يَوْمَ حَصَادِهِۦ ۖ وَلَا تُسْرِفُوٓا۟ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلْمُسْرِفِينَ
englishTranslationText:
It	is	He	Who	produces	gardens	spread	on	
the	ground	and	above,	and	the	date-palm,	
and	crops	of	various	flavours,	and	the	olive	
and	 the	 pomegranate,	 similar	 in	 some	
respects and	unlike	in	others;	eat	from	its	
fruit	when	it	bears	yield,	and	pay	the	due	(obligatory	charity)	from	it	on	the	day	it	is	harvested;	
and	do	not	be	wasteful;	indeed	the	wasteful	are	not	liked	by	Allah
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	wohi	hai	jis	ne	paida	kiye	bāgh	kuchh	
zameen	 par	 chhaye	 (Chhāyi)	 huwe	 aur	
kuchh	 be-chāyi	 (Be-Phaile)	 aur	 khajoor	
aur	kheti	jis	meiñ	rang	rang	ke	khāne	aur	Zaitoon	aur	Anār	kisi	bāt	meiñ	milte	aur	kisi	meiñ	alag	
khāo	 uska	 phal	 jab	 phal	 lāye	 aur	 uska	Haq	 do	 jis	 din	 kate	 aur	 bejā	 na	 kharcho	 be-shak	 beja	
kharach	ne	wāle	usey	pasand	nahi.

arabicText: وَمِنَ ٱلْأَنْعَـٰمِ حَمُولَةًۭ وَفَرْشًۭا ۚ كُلُوا۟ مِمَّا رَزَقَكُمُ ٱللَّهُ وَلَا تَتَّبِعُوا۟ خُطُوَٰتِ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنِ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَكُمْ عَدُوٌّۭ مُّبِينٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
And	from	the	cattle,	some	for	burdens,	some	spread	on	the	earth;	eat	of	the	sustenance	which	
Allah has	bestowed	upon	you,	and	do	not	follow	the	footsteps	of	the	devil;	undoubtedly	he	is	your	
open	enemy.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	maweshi	meiñ	se	kuchh	bojh	uthāne	wāle	aur	kuchh	zameen	par	bichhe	khāo	us	meiñ	se	jo	
Allah	 ne	 tumheiñ	Rozi	 di	aur	 shaitān	 ke	 qadamoñ	 par	 na	 chalo	 be-shak	woh	 tumhāra	 sareeh	
dushman	hai

arabicText: ثَمَـٰنِيَةَ أَزْوَٰجٍۢ ۖ مِّنَ ٱلضَّأْنِ ٱثْنَيْنِ وَمِنَ ٱلْمَعْزِ ٱثْنَيْنِ ۗ قُلْ ءَآلذَّكَرَيْنِ حَرَّمَ أَمِ ٱلْأُنثَيَيْنِ أَمَّا ٱشْتَمَلَتْ عَلَيْهِ أَرْحَامُ ٱلْأُنثَيَيْنِ ۖ نَبِّـُٔونِى بِعِلْمٍ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ
englishTranslationText:
“Eight	 males	 and	 females;	 one	 pair	 of	
sheep	 and	 one	 of	 goats”;	 say,	 “Has	 He	
forbidden	 the	 two	 males	 or	 the	 two	
females,	or	what	the	two	females	carry	in	
their	 wombs?	 Answer	 with	 some	
knowledge,	if	you	are	truthful.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Āath (8) nar	aur	māda	ek	jodā		bhed	ka	aur	
ek	 jodā	 	 bakri	 ka	 tum	 farmāo	 kya	 us	 ne	
donoñ	nar	harām	kiye	ya	donoñ	māda	ya	
woh	 jise	 donoñ	 māda	 pet	 meiñ	 liye	 haiñ	
kisi	ilm	se	batāo	agar	tum	sachhe	ho

arabicText: وَمِنَ ٱلْإِبِلِ ٱثْنَيْنِ وَمِنَ ٱلْبَقَرِ ٱثْنَيْنِ ۗ قُلْ ءَآلذَّكَرَيْنِ حَرَّمَ أَمِ ٱلْأُنثَيَيْنِ أَمَّا ٱشْتَمَلَتْ عَلَيْهِ أَرْحَامُ ٱلْأُنثَيَيْنِ ۖ أَمْ كُنتُمْ شُهَدَآءَ إِذْ وَصَّىٰكُمُ ٱللَّهُ بِهَـٰذَا ۚ فَمَنْ أَظْلَمُ مِمَّنِ ٱفْتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًۭا لِّيُضِلَّ ٱلنَّاسَ بِغَيْرِ عِلْمٍ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَهْدِى ٱلْقَوْمَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
“And	a	pair	of	camels	and	a	pair	of	oxen”;	
say,	 “Has	 He	 forbidden	 the	 two	males	 or	
the	two	females,	or	what	the	two	females	
carry	in	 their	 wombs?	Were	 you	 present	
when	 Allah commanded	 this	 to	 you?”	 So	
who	 is	 more	 unjust	 than	 one	 who	
fabricates	 a	 lie	 against	 Allah in	 order	 to	
lead	 mankind	 astray with	 his	 ignorance?	
Indeed	Allah does	not	guide	the	unjust.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	ek	joda	ooñt	ka	aur	ek	joda	gāaye	ka	
tum	 farmāo	 kya	 usne	 donoñ	 nar	 harām	
kiye	 ya	 donoñ	 māda	 ya	 woh	 jise	 donoñ	
māda	pet	meiñ	liye	haiñ	kya	tum	maujood	
they	jab	Allah	ne	tumheiñ	yeh	ḥukm		diya	
to	us	se	badh	kar	Ƶālim	kaun	jo	Allah	par	
jhooñt	bāñdhe	ke	logoñ	ko	apni	jahālat	se	
gumrāh	kare	be-shak	Allah	Ƶālimoñ	ko	rāh	
nahi	dikhāta.

arabicText: قُل لَّآ أَجِدُ فِى مَآ أُوحِىَ إِلَىَّ مُحَرَّمًا عَلَىٰ طَاعِمٍۢ يَطْعَمُهُۥٓ إِلَّآ أَن يَكُونَ مَيْتَةً أَوْ دَمًۭا مَّسْفُوحًا أَوْ لَحْمَ خِنزِيرٍۢ فَإِنَّهُۥ رِجْسٌ أَوْ فِسْقًا أُهِلَّ لِغَيْرِ ٱللَّهِ بِهِۦ ۚ فَمَنِ ٱضْطُرَّ غَيْرَ بَاغٍۢ وَلَا عَادٍۢ فَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ غَفُورٌۭ رَّحِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
Say	 (O	 dear	 Prophet	 Muhammad - peace	
and	blessings	be	upon	him),	“I	do	not	find	in	
what	 is	 sent	 down	 to	 me	 any	 eatable	
prohibited	 to	 a	 consumer,	 except	 if	 it	 is	
carrion,	 or	 blood	 flowing	 from	 blood	
vessels,	 or	 the	 flesh	 of	 swine	- for	 that	is	
indeed	foul,	or	the	sin	causing	animal	over	
which	the	name	of	any	other	than Allah is	
taken	 at	 the	 time	 of	 slaughtering;	 so	 for	
one	 compelled	 by	 circumstances,	 neither	
himself	 desiring	 nor	 eating	 more	 than	
necessary,	indeed	your	Lord	is	Oft	Forgiving,	Most	Merciful.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	farmāo	maiñ	nahi	pāta	is	meiñ	jo	meri	
taraf	 wahi	 huwi	 kisi	 khāne	 wāle	 par	 koi	
khāna	harām	magar	yeh	ke	murdār	ho	ya	
ragoñ	ka	bahta	khooñ	ya	bad	jānwar	ka	gosht	ke	woh	najāsat	hai	ya	woh	be-hukmi	ka	jānwar	
jiske	zibāh	meiñ	ghair-e-khuda	ka	nām	pukāra	gayā	to	jo	na	chār	huwa	na	yooñ	ke	āap	khuwahish	
kare	aur	na	yooñ	ke	āap	zaroorat	se	badhe	to	be-shak	Allah	bakhsh	ne	wāla	maherbān	hai

arabicText: وَعَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ هَادُوا۟ حَرَّمْنَا كُلَّ ذِى ظُفُرٍۢ ۖ وَمِنَ ٱلْبَقَرِ وَٱلْغَنَمِ حَرَّمْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ شُحُومَهُمَآ إِلَّا مَا حَمَلَتْ ظُهُورُهُمَآ أَوِ ٱلْحَوَايَآ أَوْ مَا ٱخْتَلَطَ بِعَظْمٍۢ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ جَزَيْنَـٰهُم بِبَغْيِهِمْ ۖ وَإِنَّا لَصَـٰدِقُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	for	the	Jews	We	forbade	all	animals	with	claws;	and	forbade them	the	fat	of	oxen	and	sheep	
except	which	is	on	their	backs	or	joined	to	their	intestines	or	to	the	bone;	We	awarded	this	to	
them	for	their	rebellion;	and	indeed,	surely,	We	are	truthful.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	Yahudiyoñ	par	ham	ne	harām	kiya	har	nākhoon	wāla	jānwar	aur	gāaye	aur	bakri	ki	charbi	
un	par	harām	ki	magar	jo	unki	peeth	meiñ	lagi	ho	ya	āñt	meiñ	ya	haddi	se	mili	ho	ham	ne	yeh	
unki	sarkashi	ka	badla	diya	aur		be-shak	ham	zaroor	sachche	haiñ

arabicText: فَإِن كَذَّبُوكَ فَقُل رَّبُّكُمْ ذُو رَحْمَةٍۢ وَٰسِعَةٍۢ وَلَا يُرَدُّ بَأْسُهُۥ عَنِ ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Then	 if	 they	 deny	 you	 (O	 dear	 Prophet	
Muhammad - peace	and	blessings	be	upon	
him)	say,	“Your	Lord	has	boundless	mercy;	
and	 His	 wrath	 is	 never	 withdrawn	 from	
the	culprits.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Phir	agar	woh	tumheiñ	jhutlāayeñ	to	tum	
farmāo	 ke	 tumhāra	 Rab	 wasee'	 Raḥmat	
wāla	hai	aur	uska	‘aƶāb		mujrimoñ	par	se	
nahi	tāla	jāta

arabicText: سَيَقُولُ ٱلَّذِينَ أَشْرَكُوا۟ لَوْ شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ مَآ أَشْرَكْنَا وَلَآ ءَابَآؤُنَا وَلَا حَرَّمْنَا مِن شَىْءٍۢ ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ كَذَّبَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ حَتَّىٰ ذَاقُوا۟ بَأْسَنَا ۗ قُلْ هَلْ عِندَكُم مِّنْ عِلْمٍۢ فَتُخْرِجُوهُ لَنَآ ۖ إِن تَتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا ٱلظَّنَّ وَإِنْ أَنتُمْ إِلَّا تَخْرُصُونَ
englishTranslationText:
The	 polytheists	 will	 now	 say,	 “Had	Allah
willed,	 we	 would	 not	 have	 ascribed	
partners	 (to	 Him)	 nor	 would	 have	 our	
forefathers,	nor	would	we	have	forbidden	
anything”;	similarly	those	before	them	had	
denied,	 till	 the	 time	 they	 tasted	 Our	
punishment;	 say,	 “Do	 you	 have	 any	
knowledge	 so	 you	 can	 offer	it	 to	 us?	 You	
follow	 only	 assumptions	 and	 only	 make	
guesses.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Ab	kaheñge	mushrik	ke	Allah	chāhta	to	na	
ham	 shirk	 karte	 na	 hamāre	 bāp	 dāda	 na	
ham	 kuchh	 harām	 thahrāte	 aisa	 hi	 in	 se	
agloñ	ne	jhutlāya	tha	yahāñ	tak	ke	hamāra	
‘aƶāb		chakhā		tum	farmāo	kya	tumhāre	pās	
koi	ilm	hai	ke	usey	hamāre	liye	nikālo	tum	
to	nire	gumān	ke	peeche	ho	aur	tum	yooñ	
hi	takhmeene	karte	ho.

arabicText: قُلْ فَلِلَّهِ ٱلْحُجَّةُ ٱلْبَـٰلِغَةُ ۖ فَلَوْ شَآءَ لَهَدَىٰكُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Say,	 “Then	 only	 Allah’s	 argument	 is	 the	
complete	one;	so	had	He	willed,	He	would	
have	guided	you	all.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	farmāo	to	Allah	hi	ki	hujjat	poori	hai	
to	 woh	 chāhta	 to	 tum	 sab	 ko	 hidāyat	
farmāta

arabicText: قُلْ هَلُمَّ شُهَدَآءَكُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ يَشْهَدُونَ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ حَرَّمَ هَـٰذَا ۖ فَإِن شَهِدُوا۟ فَلَا تَشْهَدْ مَعَهُمْ ۚ وَلَا تَتَّبِعْ أَهْوَآءَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا وَٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ وَهُم بِرَبِّهِمْ يَعْدِلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Say,	“Bring	your	witnesses	who	can	testify	
that	Allah has	forbidden	this”;	then	if	they	
do	 testify,	 O	 listener	 (followers	 of	 this	
Prophet)	 do	 not	 bear	 witness	 along	 with	
them	and	do	not	follow	the	desires	of	those	
who	deny	Our	signs,	and	of	those	who	do	
not	 believe	 in	 the	 Hereafter	 and	 who	
ascribed	equals	to	their	Lord.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	 farmāo	 lāo	 apne	 woh	 gawāh	 jo	
gawāhi	 deiñ	 ke	 Allah	 ne	isey	 harām	 kiya	
phir	 agar	 woh	 gawāhi	 de	 baitheiñ	 to	 	 aey	 sun	 ne	 wāle" un	 ke	 sāth	 gawāhi	 na	 dena	 aur	 unki	
khwahishoñ	ke	peeche	na	chalna	jo	hamāri	āyateiñ	jhutlāte	haiñ	aur	jo	āakhirat	par	Imān	nahi
lāte	aur	apne	Rab	ka	barābar	wāla	thahrāte	haiñ.

arabicText: ۞ قُلْ تَعَالَوْا۟ أَتْلُ مَا حَرَّمَ رَبُّكُمْ عَلَيْكُمْ ۖ أَلَّا تُشْرِكُوا۟ بِهِۦ شَيْـًۭٔا ۖ وَبِٱلْوَٰلِدَيْنِ إِحْسَـٰنًۭا ۖ وَلَا تَقْتُلُوٓا۟ أَوْلَـٰدَكُم مِّنْ إِمْلَـٰقٍۢ ۖ نَّحْنُ نَرْزُقُكُمْ وَإِيَّاهُمْ ۖ وَلَا تَقْرَبُوا۟ ٱلْفَوَٰحِشَ مَا ظَهَرَ مِنْهَا وَمَا بَطَنَ ۖ وَلَا تَقْتُلُوا۟ ٱلنَّفْسَ ٱلَّتِى حَرَّمَ ٱللَّهُ إِلَّا بِٱلْحَقِّ ۚ ذَٰلِكُمْ وَصَّىٰكُم بِهِۦ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَعْقِلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Say,	“Come	- so	that	I	may	recite	to	you	what	your	Lord	has	forbidden	for	you	that	‘Do	not	ascribe	
any	partner	to	Him	and	be	good	to	parents;	and	do	not	kill	your	children	because	of	poverty;	We	
shall	provide	sustenance	for	all	- you	and	them;	and	do	not	approach	lewd	things,	the	open	among	
them	 or	 concealed;	 and	 do	 not	 unjustly	 kill	 any	life	which	Allah has	made	 sacred;	 this	is	 the	
command	to	you,	so	that	you	may	have	sense.’
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	farmāo	āao	maiñ	tumheiñ	padh	sunāoñ	jo	tum	par	tumhāre	Rab	ne	harām	kiya	yeh	ke	uska	
koi	shareek	na	karo	aur	māñ	bāp	ke	sath	bhalāi	karo	aur	apni	aulād	qatl	na	karo	muflisi	ke	bā‘is	
ham	tumheiñ	aur	unheiñ		sab	ko	rizq	deñge	aur	be-hayāiyoñ	ke	pās	na	jāo	jo	in	meiñ	khuli	haiñ	
aur	 jo	 chhupi	 aur	 jis	 jān	 ki	 Allah	 ne	 hurmat	 Rakhi	 usey	 na	 haq	 na	 māro	 yeh	 tumheiñ	 ḥukm		
farmāya	hai	ke	tumheiñ	‘aql	ho

arabicText: وَلَا تَقْرَبُوا۟ مَالَ ٱلْيَتِيمِ إِلَّا بِٱلَّتِى هِىَ أَحْسَنُ حَتَّىٰ يَبْلُغَ أَشُدَّهُۥ ۖ وَأَوْفُوا۟ ٱلْكَيْلَ وَٱلْمِيزَانَ بِٱلْقِسْطِ ۖ لَا نُكَلِّفُ نَفْسًا إِلَّا وُسْعَهَا ۖ وَإِذَا قُلْتُمْ فَٱعْدِلُوا۟ وَلَوْ كَانَ ذَا قُرْبَىٰ ۖ وَبِعَهْدِ ٱللَّهِ أَوْفُوا۟ ۚ ذَٰلِكُمْ وَصَّىٰكُم بِهِۦ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَذَكَّرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
‘And	 do	 not	 approach	 the	 wealth	 of	 an	
orphan	except	in	 the	 best	manner,	 till	 he	
reaches	 his	 adulthood;	 and	 measure	 and	
weigh	 in	 full,	 with	 justice;	 We	 do	 not	
burden	any	soul	except	within	its	capacity;	
and	always	speak	fairly,	although	it	may	be	
concerning your	 relative;	 and	 be	 faithful	
only	 to	 Allah’s	 covenant;	 this	 is	
commanded	to	you,	so	that	you	may	accept	
advice.’	”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	yateemoñ	ke	māl	ke	pās	na	jāo	magar	
bahut	 achche	 tariqe	 se	 jab	 tak	 woh	 apni	
jawāni	ko	pahuñche	aur	nāp	aur	 tol	insāf	
ke	 sāth	 poori	 karo	 ham	 kisi	 jān	 par	 bojh	
nahi	dālte	magar	uske	maqdoor	bhar	aur	
jab	 bāt	 kaho	 to	 insāf	 ki	 kaho	 agarche	
tumhāre	 Risht-e-dār	 ka	 mu'āmla	 ho	 aur	
Allah	hi	ka	‘ahed	poora	karo	yeh	tumheiñ	
tākeed	 farmāyi	 ke	 kaheeñ	 tum	 naseehat	
māno.

arabicText: وَأَنَّ هَـٰذَا صِرَٰطِى مُسْتَقِيمًۭا فَٱتَّبِعُوهُ ۖ وَلَا تَتَّبِعُوا۟ ٱلسُّبُلَ فَتَفَرَّقَ بِكُمْ عَن سَبِيلِهِۦ ۚ ذَٰلِكُمْ وَصَّىٰكُم بِهِۦ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَتَّقُونَ
englishTranslationText:
“And	 that,	 ‘This	 is	 My	 Straight	 Path,	 so	
follow	it;	and	do	not	follow	other	ways	for	
they	will	 sever	 you	 from	His	way;	 this	is	
commanded	to	you,	so	that	you	may	attain	
piety.’	”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	yeh	ke	yeh	hai	Mera	seedha	rāsta	to	is	
par	 chalo	 aur,	 aur	 rāheñ	 na	 chalo	 ke	
tumheiñ	 uski	 rāh	 se	 juda	 kar	 deñgi	 yeh	
tumheiñ	ḥukm		farmāya	ke	kahiñ	tumheiñ	
parhez-gāri	mile

arabicText: ثُمَّ ءَاتَيْنَا مُوسَى ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ تَمَامًا عَلَى ٱلَّذِىٓ أَحْسَنَ وَتَفْصِيلًۭا لِّكُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ وَهُدًۭى وَرَحْمَةًۭ لَّعَلَّهُم بِلِقَآءِ رَبِّهِمْ يُؤْمِنُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Then	 We	 gave	 the	 Book	 to	 Moosa,	 to	
complete	 the	 favour	 on	 one	 who	 is	
virtuous,	and	an	explanation	of	all	things,	a	
guidance	and	a	mercy,	so	they	may	believe	
in	meeting	their	Lord.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Phir	Ham	 ne	 Mūsā	 ko	 Kitāb	 'aṭa	 farmāyi	
poora	ehsān	 karne	 ko	 us	 par	jo	 neko-kār	
hai	aur	har	cheez	ki	tafseel	aur	hidāyat	aur	
raḥmat	ke	kaheeñ	woh	apne	rab	se	milne	
par	Imān	lāayeiñ

arabicText: وَهَـٰذَا كِتَـٰبٌ أَنزَلْنَـٰهُ مُبَارَكٌۭ فَٱتَّبِعُوهُ وَٱتَّقُوا۟ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُرْحَمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 this	(the	Qur’an)	is	 the	blessed	Book	
which	We	have	sent	down;	so	follow	it	and	
be	pious,	so	there	may	be	mercy	upon	you
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	yeh	Barkat	wāli	Kitāb	ham	ne	utāri	to	
iski	 pairwi	 karo	 aur	 parhez-gāri	 karo	 ke	
tum	par	rahem	ho.

arabicText: أَن تَقُولُوٓا۟ إِنَّمَآ أُنزِلَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبُ عَلَىٰ طَآئِفَتَيْنِ مِن قَبْلِنَا وَإِن كُنَّا عَن دِرَاسَتِهِمْ لَغَـٰفِلِينَ
englishTranslationText:
For	 you	 (the	 disbelievers)	 may	 say,	 “The	
Book	 was	 sent	 down	 only	 to	 two	 groups	
(Jews	 and	 Christians)	 before	 us;	 and	 we	
were	 totally	 unaware	 of	 what	 they	 read	
and	taught.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kabhi	kaho	ke	kitāb	to	ham	se	pahle	do	girohoñ	par	utri	thi	aur	hameiñ	unke	padhne	padhāne	ki	
kuchh	khabar	na	thi	.

arabicText: أَوْ تَقُولُوا۟ لَوْ أَنَّآ أُنزِلَ عَلَيْنَا ٱلْكِتَـٰبُ لَكُنَّآ أَهْدَىٰ مِنْهُمْ ۚ فَقَدْ جَآءَكُم بَيِّنَةٌۭ مِّن رَّبِّكُمْ وَهُدًۭى وَرَحْمَةٌۭ ۚ فَمَنْ أَظْلَمُ مِمَّن كَذَّبَ بِـَٔايَـٰتِ ٱللَّهِ وَصَدَفَ عَنْهَا ۗ سَنَجْزِى ٱلَّذِينَ يَصْدِفُونَ عَنْ ءَايَـٰتِنَا سُوٓءَ ٱلْعَذَابِ بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَصْدِفُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Or	may	say	that,	“If	the	Book	had	been	sent	down	to	us,	we	would	have	been	more	upon	guidance	
than	them”;	so	the	clear	proof	and	guidance	and	mercy	has	come	to	you,	from	your	Lord;	so	who	
is	more	unjust	than	one	who	denies	the	signs	of	Allah,	and turns	away	from	them?	We	shall	soon	
punish	those	who	turn	away	from	Our	signs	with	a	great	punishment,	the	recompense	of	their	
turning	away.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Ya	kaho	ke	agar	ham	par	kitāb	utarti	 to	ham	un	se	ziyāda	 theek	rāh	par	hote	 to	 tumhāre	pās	
tumhāre	Rab	ki	Raushan	Daleel	aur	Hidāyat	aur	Raḥmat	āayi	to	us	se	ziyāda	Ƶālim	kaun	jo	Allah	
ki	āyatoñ	ko	jhutlāye	aur	unse	moñh	phere	‘an-qareeb	woh	Jo	hamāri	āayatoñ	se	muñh	pherte	
haiñ	ham	unheiñ		bure	‘aƶāb		ki	saza	deñge	badla	unke	moñh	pherne	ka.

arabicText: هَلْ يَنظُرُونَ إِلَّآ أَن تَأْتِيَهُمُ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ أَوْ يَأْتِىَ رَبُّكَ أَوْ يَأْتِىَ بَعْضُ ءَايَـٰتِ رَبِّكَ ۗ يَوْمَ يَأْتِى بَعْضُ ءَايَـٰتِ رَبِّكَ لَا يَنفَعُ نَفْسًا إِيمَـٰنُهَا لَمْ تَكُنْ ءَامَنَتْ مِن قَبْلُ أَوْ كَسَبَتْ فِىٓ إِيمَـٰنِهَا خَيْرًۭا ۗ قُلِ ٱنتَظِرُوٓا۟ إِنَّا مُنتَظِرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
What	are	they	waiting	for	- except	that	the	
angels	 come	 to	 them,	 or	 the	 punishment	
from	your	Lord,	or	one	of	the	signs	of	your	
Lord?	On	the	day	when	the	(foretold)	sign	
of	your	Lord	comes,	not	a	single	soul	who	
had	not	earlier	accepted	 faith	nor	earned	
any good	 from	its	 faith,	will	 benefit	 from	
accepting	 faith;	 say,	 “Wait	 - we	 too	 are	
waiting.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kāhe	 ke	intezār	meiñ	 haiñ	magar	 yeh	 ke	
āayeñ	unke	pās	firishte	ya	tumhāre	Rab	ka	
‘aƶāb		āaye	ya	 tumhāre	Rab	ki	ek	nishāni	
āaye	 jis	 din	 tumhāre	 Rab	 ki	 ek	 nishāni	
āayegi	kisi	jān	ko	Imān	lāna	kām	na	dega	jo	
pahle	Imān	na	lāyi	thi	ya	apne	imān	meiñ	
koi	bhalāi	na	kamāyi	thi	tum	farmāo	rastā	
dekho	ham	bhi	dekhte	haiñ.

arabicText: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ فَرَّقُوا۟ دِينَهُمْ وَكَانُوا۟ شِيَعًۭا لَّسْتَ مِنْهُمْ فِى شَىْءٍ ۚ إِنَّمَآ أَمْرُهُمْ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ ثُمَّ يُنَبِّئُهُم بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَفْعَلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
You	(O	 dear	 Prophet	 Muhammad - peace	
and	 blessings	 be	 upon	 him)	 have	 no	
concern	 with	 those	 who	 divided	 their	
religion	and	became	several	groups;	their	
case	is	only	with	Allah -He	will	then	inform	
them	of	what	they	used	to	do.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Woh	jinhoñ		ne	apne	deen	meiñ	juda	juda	
rāheiñ	 nikāliñ	 aur	 kai	 giroh	 ho	 gaye	 aey	
Mehboob" Tumheiñ	 unse	 kuchh	 ‘ilāqa	
(T’alluq)	 	 nahi	 unka	 mu'āmla	 Allah	 hi	 ke	
hawāle	hai	phir	woh	unheiñ		batā	dega	jo	
kuchh	woh	kartey	they

arabicText: مَن جَآءَ بِٱلْحَسَنَةِ فَلَهُۥ عَشْرُ أَمْثَالِهَا ۖ وَمَن جَآءَ بِٱلسَّيِّئَةِ فَلَا يُجْزَىٰٓ إِلَّا مِثْلَهَا وَهُمْ لَا يُظْلَمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
For	one	who	brings	one	good	deed,	are	ten	
like	it;	and	one	who	brings	an	ill-deed	will	
not	be	repaid	but	with	one	like	it,	and	they	
will	not	be	wronged.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Jo	 ek	 neki	 lāye	 to	 uskey	 liye	 us	 jaisi	 das	
haiñ	 aur	 jo	 burāyi	 lāye	 to	 usey	 badla	 na	
milega	 magar	 uske	 barābar	 aur	 un	 par	
zulm	na	hoga

arabicText: قُلْ إِنَّنِى هَدَىٰنِى رَبِّىٓ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطٍۢ مُّسْتَقِيمٍۢ دِينًۭا قِيَمًۭا مِّلَّةَ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ حَنِيفًۭا ۚ وَمَا كَانَ مِنَ ٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Say,	“Indeed	my	Lord	has	guided	me	to	the	
Straight	 Path;	 the	 right	 religion,	 (of)	 the	
community	of	Ibrahim	who	was	free	from	
all	falsehood;	and	was	not	a	polytheist.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	 farmāo	 be-shak	mujhe	mere	Rab	ne	
seedhi	rāh	dikhāi	theek	deen	Ibrāheem ki	
millat	jo	har	bātil	se	juda	they	aur	mushrik	
na	they

arabicText: قُلْ إِنَّ صَلَاتِى وَنُسُكِى وَمَحْيَاىَ وَمَمَاتِى لِلَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Say,	 “Undoubtedly	 my	 prayers	 and	 my	
sacrifices,	and	my	living	and	my	dying	are	
all	for	Allah,	the	Lord	Of	The	Creation.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	farmāo	be-shak	meri	Namāz	aur	meri	
qurbāniyāñ	 aur	 mera	 jeena	 aur	 mera	
marna	 sab	 Allah	 ke	 liye	 hai	 jo	 Rab	 sāre	
jahān	ka.

arabicText: لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُۥ ۖ وَبِذَٰلِكَ أُمِرْتُ وَأَنَا۠ أَوَّلُ ٱلْمُسْلِمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
“He	has	no	partner;	this	is	what	I	have	been	
commanded,	and	I	am	the	first	Muslim.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Uska	 koi	 shareek	 nahi	 mujhe	 yahi	 ḥukm		
huwa	hai	aur	maiñ	sabse	pahla	Musalmān	
hooñ.

arabicText: قُلْ أَغَيْرَ ٱللَّهِ أَبْغِى رَبًّۭا وَهُوَ رَبُّ كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ ۚ وَلَا تَكْسِبُ كُلُّ نَفْسٍ إِلَّا عَلَيْهَا ۚ وَلَا تَزِرُ وَازِرَةٌۭ وِزْرَ أُخْرَىٰ ۚ ثُمَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكُم مَّرْجِعُكُمْ فَيُنَبِّئُكُم بِمَا كُنتُمْ فِيهِ تَخْتَلِفُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Say,	“Shall	I	seek	a	Lord	other	than	Allah,	
whereas	He	is	Lord	of	all	things?”	And	whatever	a	soul	earns	is	itself	responsible	for	it;	and	no	
load	bearing	soul	will	bear	anyone	else’s	load;	then	towards	your	Lord	you	have	to	return	and	He	
will	inform	you	about	the	matters	you	differed.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	 farmāo	kya	Allah	ke	siwa	aur	Rab	chāhooñ	halāñke	woh	har	cheez	ka	Rab	hai	aur	jo	koi	
kuchh	kamāaye	woh	usi	ke	zimme	hai	aur	koi	bojh	uthāne	wāli	Jān	doosre	ka	bojh	na	uthāayegi	
phir	tumheiñ	apne	Rab	ki	taraf	phirna	hai	woh	tumheiñ	batā	dega	jis	meiñ	ikhtilāf		kartey	they.

arabicText: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَكُمْ خَلَـٰٓئِفَ ٱلْأَرْضِ وَرَفَعَ بَعْضَكُمْ فَوْقَ بَعْضٍۢ دَرَجَـٰتٍۢ لِّيَبْلُوَكُمْ فِى مَآ ءَاتَىٰكُمْ ۗ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ سَرِيعُ ٱلْعِقَابِ وَإِنَّهُۥ لَغَفُورٌۭ رَّحِيمٌۢ
englishTranslationText:
And	it	is	He	who	made	you	caliphs	(viceroys)	in	the	earth	and	ranked	some	of	you	high	above	
others,	in	order	that	He	may	test	you	with	what	He	has	bestowed	upon	you;	indeed	it	does	not	
take	time	for	your	Lord	to	mete	out	punishment;	and	indeed,	surely,	He	is	Oft	Forgiving,	Most	
Merciful.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	wohi	hai	jis	ne	zameen	meiñ	tumheiñ	nāyib	kiya	aur	tum	meiñ	ek	doosre	ko	darjoñ	bulañdi	
di	ke	tumheiñ	āzmāaye	us	cheez	meiñ	jo	tumheiñ	'aṭa	ki	be-shak	tumhāre	Rab	ko	‘aƶāb	kartey	der	
nahi	lagti	aur	be-shak	woh	zaroor	bakhsh	ne	wāla	maherbān	hai

arabicText: الٓمٓصٓ
englishTranslationText: Alif-Lám-Mím-Şád*
romanUrduTranslationText:
Alif-Lám-Mím-Şád* (*Arabi	 zabān	 ke
huroof	jinke	ma’āni	Allah	aur jis	par	Allah	
ne	inko	Nazil	farmaya	Wahi	janta	hai.)

arabicText: كِتَـٰبٌ أُنزِلَ إِلَيْكَ فَلَا يَكُن فِى صَدْرِكَ حَرَجٌۭ مِّنْهُ لِتُنذِرَ بِهِۦ وَذِكْرَىٰ لِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
englishTranslationText:
O	 dear	 Prophet	(Muhammad - peace	 and	
blessings	 be	 upon	 him),	 a	 Book	 has	 been	
sent	 down	 upon	 you,	 therefore	 may	 not	
your	 heart	 be	 disinclined	 towards	 it,	 so	
that	you	may	give	warning	with	it,	and	as	
an	advice	for	the	Muslims
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	Mehboob!		Ek	Kitāb	tumhāri	taraf	utāri	
gayi	to	tumhāra	jee	is	se	na	ruke	is	liye	ke	
tum	 is	 se	 dar	 sunāo	 aur	 Musalmānoñ	 ko	
nasihat	.

arabicText: كِتَـٰبٌ أُنزِلَ إِلَيْكَ فَلَا يَكُن فِى صَدْرِكَ حَرَجٌۭ مِّنْهُ لِتُنذِرَ بِهِۦ وَذِكْرَىٰ لِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
englishTranslationText:
O	 dear	 Prophet	(Muhammad - peace	 and	
blessings	 be	 upon	 him),	 a	 Book	 has	 been	
sent	 down	 upon	 you,	 therefore	 may	 not	
your	 heart	 be	 disinclined	 towards	 it,	 so	
that	you	may	give	warning	with	it,	and	as	
an	advice	for	the	Muslims
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	Mehboob!		Ek	Kitāb	tumhāri	taraf	utāri	
gayi	to	tumhāra	jee	is	se	na	ruke	is	liye	ke	
tum	 is	 se	 dar	 sunāo	 aur	 Musalmānoñ	 ko	
nasihat	.

arabicText: كِتَـٰبٌ أُنزِلَ إِلَيْكَ فَلَا يَكُن فِى صَدْرِكَ حَرَجٌۭ مِّنْهُ لِتُنذِرَ بِهِۦ وَذِكْرَىٰ لِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
englishTranslationText:
O	 dear	 Prophet	(Muhammad - peace	 and	
blessings	 be	 upon	 him),	 a	 Book	 has	 been	
sent	 down	 upon	 you,	 therefore	 may	 not	
your	 heart	 be	 disinclined	 towards	 it,	 so	
that	you	may	give	warning	with	it,	and	as	
an	advice	for	the	Muslims
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	Mehboob!		Ek	Kitāb	tumhāri	taraf	utāri	
gayi	to	tumhāra	jee	is	se	na	ruke	is	liye	ke	
tum	 is	 se	 dar	 sunāo	 aur	 Musalmānoñ	 ko	
nasihat	.

arabicText: ٱتَّبِعُوا۟ مَآ أُنزِلَ إِلَيْكُم مِّن رَّبِّكُمْ وَلَا تَتَّبِعُوا۟ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ أَوْلِيَآءَ ۗ قَلِيلًۭا مَّا تَذَكَّرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
O	 mankind,	 follow	 what	 has	 been	 sent	
down	 to	 you	 from	 your	 Lord,	and	 do	 not	
follow	 other	 administrators,	 abandoning	
this	(the	 Holy	 Qur’an);	 very	 little	 do	 you	
understand.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	 logoñ" Us	 par	 chalo	 jo	 tumhāri	 taraf	
tumhāre	Rab	ke	pās	se	utra	aur	usey	chhod	
kar	aur	hākimoñ	ke	peeche	na	jāo	bahut	hi	
kam	samajhte	ho.

arabicText: وَكَم مِّن قَرْيَةٍ أَهْلَكْنَـٰهَا فَجَآءَهَا بَأْسُنَا بَيَـٰتًا أَوْ هُمْ قَآئِلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	many	a	township	did	We	destroy	- so	
Our	punishment	came	to	them	at	night	or	
while	they	were	sleeping	at	noon.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	kitni hi	bastiyāñ	ham	ne	halāk	keiñ	to	
un	par	Hamāra	‘aƶāb	rāt	meiñ	āaya	ya	jab	
woh	dopahar	ko	sote	they

arabicText: وَكَم مِّن قَرْيَةٍ أَهْلَكْنَـٰهَا فَجَآءَهَا بَأْسُنَا بَيَـٰتًا أَوْ هُمْ قَآئِلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	many	a	township	did	We	destroy	- so	
Our	punishment	came	to	them	at	night	or	
while	they	were	sleeping	at	noon.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	kitni hi	bastiyāñ	ham	ne	halāk	keiñ	to	
un	par	Hamāra	‘aƶāb	rāt	meiñ	āaya	ya	jab	
woh	dopahar	ko	sote	they

arabicText: فَمَا كَانَ دَعْوَىٰهُمْ إِذْ جَآءَهُم بَأْسُنَآ إِلَّآ أَن قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّا كُنَّا ظَـٰلِمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Therefore they	uttered	nothing	when	Our	
punishment	 came	 to	 them,	 except	 that	
they	said,	“Indeed	we	were	the	unjust.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	 unke	 muñh	 se	 kuchh	 na	 nikla	 jab	
hamāra	‘aƶāb	unpar	āaya	magar	yehi	bole	
ke	ham	Ƶālim	they

arabicText: فَلَنَسْـَٔلَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ أُرْسِلَ إِلَيْهِمْ وَلَنَسْـَٔلَنَّ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
englishTranslationText:
So	undoubtedly	We	shall	question	those	to	
whom	 Our	 Noble	 Messengers	 went,	 and	
indeed	 We	 shall	 question	 the	 Noble	
Messengers.
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	 be-shak	 zaroor	 hameiñ	 pooñchna	 hai	
unse	 jinke	 pās	 Rasool	 gaye	 aur	 be-shak	
zaroor	hameiñ	pooñchna	hai	Rasooloñ	se

arabicText: فَلَنَقُصَّنَّ عَلَيْهِم بِعِلْمٍۢ ۖ وَمَا كُنَّا غَآئِبِينَ
englishTranslationText:
So	indeed	We	shall	inform	them	with	Our	
knowledge	and	We	were	not	absent.
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	zaroor	Ham	unko	batā	deñge	apne	Ilm	
se	aur	ham	kuchh	ghāyib	na	they

arabicText: وَٱلْوَزْنُ يَوْمَئِذٍ ٱلْحَقُّ ۚ فَمَن ثَقُلَتْ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْمُفْلِحُونَ
englishTranslationText: And	on	that	Day,	the	weighing	will	truly	be	done;	so	those	whose	scales	prove	heavy	are	the	successful.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	us	din	tol	zaroor	honi	hai	to	jinke	palle	
bhāri	huye	wohi	murād	ko	pahuñche.

arabicText: وَمَنْ خَفَّتْ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ خَسِرُوٓا۟ أَنفُسَهُم بِمَا كَانُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا يَظْلِمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	those	whose	scales	are	light	are	the	people	who	put	themselves	to	ruin	- the	recompense	of	
the	injustice	they	used	to	do	to	Our	signs.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jinke	palle	halke	huwe	 to	wohi	haiñ	jinhoñ	ne	apni	jān	ghāte	meiñ	dāli	un	ziyādatiyoñ	ka	
badla	jo	hamāri	āayatoñ	par	karte	they

arabicText: وَلَقَدْ مَكَّنَّـٰكُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَجَعَلْنَا لَكُمْ فِيهَا مَعَـٰيِشَ ۗ قَلِيلًۭا مَّا تَشْكُرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	indeed	We	established	you	in	the	earth	and	in	it	created	for	you	the	means	of	livelihood;	very	
little	thanks	do	you	offer!
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	be-shak	ham	ne	tumheiñ	zameen	meiñ	jamāo	(Thikāna)	diya	aur	tumhāre	liye	is	meiñ	zindagi	
ke	asbāb	banāaye	bahut	hi	kam	shukr	karte	ho

arabicText: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَـٰكُمْ ثُمَّ صَوَّرْنَـٰكُمْ ثُمَّ قُلْنَا لِلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةِ ٱسْجُدُوا۟ لِـَٔادَمَ فَسَجَدُوٓا۟ إِلَّآ إِبْلِيسَ لَمْ يَكُن مِّنَ ٱلسَّـٰجِدِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	indeed	We	created	you,	then	designed	you	and	then	ordered	the	angels,	“Prostrate before	
Adam”;	so	they	all	prostrated,	except	Iblis	(Satan);	he	did	not	become	of	those	who	prostrate.	
(*Alphabets of the Arabic language; Allah and to whomever He reveals, know their precise 
meanings.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	be-shak	Ham	ne	tumheiñ	paida	kiya	phir	tumhāre	naqshe	banāaye	phir	Ham	ne	malāika	se	
farmāya	ke	Ādam ko	sajda	karo	to	woh	sab	sajde	meiñ	gire	magar	Iblees	yeh	sajda	wāloñ	meiñ	
na	huwa

arabicText: قَالَ مَا مَنَعَكَ أَلَّا تَسْجُدَ إِذْ أَمَرْتُكَ ۖ قَالَ أَنَا۠ خَيْرٌۭ مِّنْهُ خَلَقْتَنِى مِن نَّارٍۢ وَخَلَقْتَهُۥ مِن طِينٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
Said	Allah,	“What	prevented	you,	that	you	
did	 not	 prostrate	 when	 I	 commanded	
you?”	 Answered	 Iblis,	 “I	 am	 better	 than	
him;	 You	 created	 me	 from	 fire	 whereas	
You	created	him	from	clay.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Farmāya	kis	cheez	ne	tujhe	roñka	ke	toone	
sajda	na	kiya	jab	maiñ	ne	tujhe	ḥukm		diya	
tha	 bola	 maiñ	 us	 se	 behtar	 hooñ	 toone	
mujhe	 āag	 se	 banāya	 aur	 usey	 mitti	 se	
banāya
